description: Parity threshold governance configuration - applies to POSITIVE suite only

overall.description: Positive suite must maintain 100% pass rate with no regressions

S0.description: Critical fields must have 100% pass rate in positive suite

S1.description: Major fields must have 100% pass rate in positive suite

S2.description: Minor fields must have 100% pass rate in positive suite

S3.description: Info fields must have 100% pass rate in positive suite

negativeSuite.description: Negative suite validates that expected failures are correctly detected

semanticRules.description: When status is PASS, reasonCode must be null/absent. VALID is NOT a reason code.
